embed.title: Cyclops Tips
embed.description: Tips on Cyclops Honor Hunting formation.

fields.name: Best Troops
fields.value:
• Pilgrims: 2 level-9 or 3 level-8
• Brawlers: 3 level-9 or 4 level-8
• Voodoo Dolls: a lot of level-9
• Peltasts: a lot of level-9
• Frost Archers: a few

fields.name: Filler Troops
fields.value:
• Voodoo Dolls: level-8
• Taurus Witcher: level-9
• Ghost Assassins: level-9
• Undead Soldier: level-9
• Other 9-load troops, preferably level-9

fields.name: Tips
fields.value: • Do not use the Evade button.

fields.name: Stages
fields.value:
• Stage 1: day 1-3
• Stage 2: day 4-6
• Stage 3: day 7
